alert.note: Alert for Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 3:27PM MST until August 31 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... Western Santa Cruz County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 415 PM MST. * At 327 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rio Rico, or 7 miles west of Nogales, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Green Valley, Tubac, Rio Rico, Arivaca, Tumacacori, Amado, Pena Blanca Lake, Arivaca Lake, Ruby and Arivaca Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
